name: Rat Lich
description:
A 2D videogame developed as a final project for class! Fulfill your fantasy of becoming the ultimate undead rat in a 30-minute action game!

Game developement, art direction and animation by Kilian Molina.

Sound design by Oriol Matamales and Xavi García.

Music by Pablo Jimenez and Kyle Muñoz.

IMPORTANT: Remember that this is a school project, so it's not as polished as a full product. Please read the release devlog for further details! Also, it's currently only available in Spanish.
